author: Kerry Flynn
title: Facebook vs. the internet cesspool: The ugly fight of our ugly times

author: BBC News
description: The "inconsistent" rules used to judge and censor content on Facebook are exposed, claim insiders.
title: Leaks 'expose peculiar Facebook moderation policy'

author: Sam Shead
description: The feature allows Ariana Grande fans to mark themselves as safe on Facebook.
title: Facebook turns on Safety Check feature after Manchester explosion

author: Welt Redaktion
description: Facebook überprüft Millionen Beschwerden pro Woche und löscht im Zweifel die Beiträge. Die Grundlage dafür ist teils fragwürdig, wie nun ein Bericht enthüllt.
title: So absurd löscht Facebook

author: Max Biederbeck
description: Facebooks Lösch-Praxis kommt per Leak an die Öffentlichkeit. Warum veröffentlicht das Unternehmen sie nicht selbst? Ein Kommentar.
title: Liebes Facebook, Transparenz ist nicht dein Feind

author: Andrew Liptak
description: As Facebook grows, it will need to continually scale up its efforts to address graphic content.
title: Leaked moderation guidelines reveal how Facebook approaches handling graphic content

author: Johana Bhuiyan
description: The Guardian obtained documents that reveal how Facebook polices content posted on the social giant network.
title: Here are some pretty awful things you can (and cannot) say on Facebook

author: WIRED Staff
description: Geleakte Schulungsunterlagen zeigen erstmals die komplexen Vorgaben, anhand derer Facebook Inhalte löscht.
title: Leak: So versucht Facebook, schwierige Inhalte zu löschen

author: Kurt Wagner and Peter Kafka
description: One challenge is figuring out where these shows will live outside of Facebook’s video tab.
title: Facebook is delaying the launch of its original videos until the end of summer

author: Natasha Lomas
description: The Guardian has published details of Facebook's content moderation guidelines covering controversial issues such as violence, hate speech and self-harm..
title: Facebook’s content moderation rules dubbed “alarming” by child safety charity
